ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: This is assuming you are in a 2v1 or 3v1 lane, if you are in a 2v2 lane, perhaps a Stout Shield would be better here.
ItemTooltips.branches: Sell this for space when needed.
ItemTooltips.hyperstone: Get this item after your finish your Armlet.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Rush ths, use every time it`s off cooldown
ItemTooltips.assault:
Get this or Mjollnir after you have Crystalys & Skull Basher.

AC - If your team benefits from the aura

Mjollnir - If your team does not benefit from the aura
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this if your not magic immune for long enough.
ItemTooltips.rapier: Build if you have too much money.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Build if enemies are making you miss your attacks or they are being dodged.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Finish this item before Abyssal Blade if you feel your lacking damage.
ItemTooltips.basher: Buy this item before Crystalys if you feel your enemies are escaping too often.
ItemTooltips.lesser_crit: Buy this item before Skull Basher if you feel your lacking damage.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Amazing item for Lifestealer, always build this straight after treads.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Build if you don`t have enough lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir:
Get this or AC after you have Crystalys & Skull Basher.

AC - If your team benefits from the aura

Mjollnir - If your team does not benefit from the aura
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: Build this before Daedalus if magic immunity is causing you problems, or if your enemies are getting away too often.
